text: Pengalaman yg sangat berkesan menginap dihotel ini,fasilitas yg memadai dan lokasi hotel yg sangat strategis membuat saya pastinya akan kembali lagi kesini , terima kasih banyak buat staffnya mas dimas atas keramah tamahannya.Tebu hotel juaraa!!!

Overall untuk semuanya saya cukup puas hanya sedikit catatan yang ingin menginap disini. title: Great Location

text:
Banyak hotel dgn lokasi strategis di bandung. Tp pd tgl 20-21 Juni 2020 sy menjatuhkan pilihan ke Tebu Hotel utk pertama kalinya. Utk pertama kalinya jg sy kecewa (mana pesan 3 kamar utk keluarga). Fasilitas hotel yg tdk sesuai foto & deskripsi yg tertera (seperti: yg tertera difoto bantal ada 4, ada kursi, kran air panas yg rusak utk kamar org tua, & masalah lainnya). Dan resepsionis yg tdk sopan melayani tamu nya (bernama Santika) ketika ada kendala di kamar, respon sangat buruk.
Mohon utk management Tebu Hotel utk meningkatkan kualitas dr para karyawan & fasilitasnya. Supaya ada bedanya dr hotel bintang 2 atau "hotel melati". Meski harga murah & bersaing tetapi tdk murahan.
Terimakasih.
title: Resepsionis yg tdk sopan (Mrs Santika), Kran Air panas yang rusak, AC krg dingin, Wifi lemot, Fasilitas kurang.

text: Ide yg cerdas, walaupun Kamarnya agak sempit tapi disiasati dgn jendela yg sangat besar jadinya nyaman dan gak pengap. Plus nya lagi resto adanya di lantai 9,jadi walaupun rasa makanannya biasa saja bisa tertutupi dgn resto yg bagus pemandangan nya. Overall ok, Dengan harga yg terjangkau, pelayanan nya pas lah. Gak lebih, gak kurang.

Harga oke, kamar oke pelayanan juga oke, lokasi juga strategis, mau ke FO  cafe tempat makan gampang, jln kaki aja, gak kapok pokoknya nginap di hotel tebu next kalau kebandung kesini lagi :), 
Te Op Be Ge Te
title: Tebu hotel mantul

text: Fasilitas hotel bagus dengan kamar yang selalu dalam keadaan bersih sangat menyenangkan buat istirahat.... pelayanan ramah dan memuaskan.... lokasi strategis dekat dengan tempat perbelanjaan dan fasilitas umum....
title: Cozy place

text: hotelnya cukup bersih. terletak di pinggir jalan raya (jalan riau). dekat dengan minimarket. kalau malam banyak yang jual makanan dekat masjid istiqomah. pelayanan cukup baik. jendela kamar lebar jadi bisa melihat view secara luas. hanya kekurangannya adalah lahan parkir yang sempit.
title: affordable hotel at strategic location

text: Saya sangat berkesan untuk menginap di tebu hotel yang mempunyai kesan penuh gaya, staf ramah, pelayanan enak, dan hotel sangat bersih dan mempunyai penmandangan city view yang bagus mantap tebu hotel 💕
title: Hotel nyaman

text: Ketika kami harus ke bandung, pertama kali hotel yg kami cari adalah TEBU hotel. Kenapa? Mulai dr pelayanan yg baik, menu breakfast yg banyak n enak, yg terpenting anak sy bisa ikut makan juga. Kamar n tempat tdr yg nyaman, ga berisik. Air bersih dan kamar mandi bersih dan wangi. Ketika sampai di hotel tengah malampun,kami ttp bisa bikin minuman panas dgn fasilitas yg sdh disediakan hotel. Tempat yg strategis ketika harus kerkunjung ke bbrp tempat. Dan yg paling sy sukai adalah bgtu keluar hotel, suasana malamnya asik bgt buat nongkrong di sepanjang jalannya.. recomanded dah, buat yg mau menginap di tebu hotel bandung. Owh iyaa... harga bersahabat.. hehehe..
title: Berkunjung di bandung

text: Saya menginap di tebu hotel ini kebetulan berempat orang jadi pesan type kamar yg duplex, semua ok sih, cuma jika ingin nambah pinjam handuk, sendal, gosok gigi dan bbrp item lainnya itu semua berbayar, menu sarapan pagi kurang bervariasi, kalau untuk lokasi lumayan strategis karena dekat dengan FO FO di jl. Riau, tapi ada pengalaman buruk diarea sini, teman saya terkena hipnotis terkuras uangnya di atm 3,5jt. Dan kata satpam hotel diarea dkt hotel banyak
title: Hotel Yang Nyaman dan Strategis

text: Menginap di tebu hotel sangat nyaman, kamar nya yg bersih, viewnya bagus, staff nya ramah ramah, sangat nyaman dan sangan membantu, lobby nya minimalis tapi nyaman . Terimakasih tebu hotel. Terimakasih juga ke mas regy dan mba santika di receptionist telah membantu saya
title: Nyaman

text:
Tebu Hotel menyediakan pilihan kamar yang cocok untuk kunjungan bisnis atau backpacking
Kamarnya tidak luas, tapi nyaman dan bersih 
Fasilitas standar sesuai kelasnya yang bintang 3 
Pilihan menu sarapan cukup beragam meski rasanya biasa saja. And sorry to say, the coffee is awful 😂 
Dan sayangnya, entah kenapa, sudah minta kamar dengan single bed tapi lagi-lagi dikasih kamar dengan tein bed yang digeser dijadikan 1 bed. 
Is it missed communication? Single bed means 1 one bed for one person hahaha
title: Budget Hotel di lokasi strategis

text:
Saya seorang tour arranggement,saya sudah beberapa kali bawa grup/rombongan menginap di Tebu Hotel
Secara keseluruhan tak ada masalah,respon cepat dari para staff sangat membantu ketika kami memerlukan layanan
Salut buat seluruh staff,mulai dari security sampai dengan marketing nya
setiap ketemu,mereka lebih dulu menyapa dan mengucapkan salam

Terima Kasih buat semua nya,tunggu saya pada trip selanjutnya
title: Bandung City Tour

text: Kebersihan dan kerapihan bagus,strategis untuk ke arah pusat kota seperti gedung sate, lapangan gazibu bandung, factory outlet banyak disekitar hotel, tempat kuliner banyak pilihan, dan harga relatif terjangkau, wifi diharap kedepan lebih bagus,
title: Hotel lumayan good

text: Sudah 5 kali saya kembali stay di tebu hotel setiap bulan saya selalu stay di tebu hotel, dengan kamar yg sangat nyaman dan suasana yg menenangkan.... hanya saya untuk floor 7 dan 8 saya merasa kurang puas dengan wifi nya sangat lambat... untuk breakfast sangat sedikit menunya dan saat breakfast selalu saja ada yg habis dan lambat untuk di refill. Semoga ketika saya kembali semuanya lebih baik dan lebih nyaman
title: Hotel yg saya suka tapi kurang puas

text: Kami merasa nyaman dihotel ini, makanan nya enak dari atas keliahatan kota bandungnya yang bagus. dan kamarnya nyaman. Resevsionisnya ramah ramah.cantik cantik ganteng ganteng.bentuk hotelnya unik dan bagus
title: Liburan

text: Kami merasa nyaman dihotel ini,fasilitas lengkap,kamar nyaman dan bersih,makanannya enak,dari atas bisa di lihat pemandangan bandung nya,lobbynyaa bagus dan bentuk hotelnya unik,karyawan nya juga sopan dan baik.
title: Liburan

text: Kunjungan ke tebu hotel untuk bisnis, hotelnya enak nyaman, dekat kemana mana, sejuk juga, staff nya ramah ramah mulai dari masuk hotel sampe saya check out, terimakasih juga kepada mas regy telah membantu saya selama menginap
title: Bisnis

text: Menginap di tebu hotel dari hari rabu untuk perjalanan bisni, sangat nyaman pelayanannya ramah, kamarnya bagus, dan staff staff mya ramah ramah. Terimakasih juga kepada mas regy atas bantuannya selama saya menginap
title: business

text: Hotel tebu menjadi salah satu pilihan buat kel menginap selain strategis posisinya hotel bangunan baru,bagus,rapih,makanan enak..pokoknya cocok buat liburan keluarga di bandung.recoment banget pokoknya....
title: Tempat yg strategis

text: Maknyus, kinyis2, perjalanan bisnis jadi mudah dan dekat, apalagi deket sama factory outletnya dan gampang nyari tempat nongkrong buat hangout dan makan, tempat nya okay, bersih dan karyawannya Ramah Dan humble
title: Mr. O

text: Liburan di tebu hotel, hotel nya minimalis tapi strategis dekat dengan fo dan tempat makan, untuk staff nya juga friendly, ramah ramah. Kamarnya kecil tapi nyaman dan semua nya enak ramah ramah mantap. Terimakasih mas regy atas bantuannya
title: Liburan

text:
Ke bandung dalam rangka bisnis, review hotel tebu :
- kamar bersih dan nyaman
- kamar mandi bersih
- disediakan setrikaan (baru kali ini dapat hotel disediakan setrikaan)
- makan sarapan lumayan lengkap
title: Nice hotel

text: tiba dah malem, lihat kamar yg rapi, kamar mandi yg bersih, jd hilang capek perjalanan dr jkt. tempat hang out banyak tersedia dekat hotel. value money, nice place for relax. next trip to bandung insya Allah
title: nyaman dan tenang

text: Hotelnya nyaman, harganya masih reasonable, mau cari makan diluar juga banyak dan enak-enak. sarapannya enak dan makan di sky dinning. Penasaran sama seafood street dari chef abun. Malam musti nyobain nih
title: Dinas asyik

text: Liburan lebaran kali ini saya menginap di hotel tebu bandung sekalian silaturahmi sama keluarga di bandung, sebelumnya saya menginap di kamar 1101 saya sempat complain karena ada masalah di kamarnya, sangat sigap complain saya langsung di dengar oleh karyawan karyawan hotel, karena ada cukup masalah dan agak lama akhirnya saya di tawari move room oleh receptionist nya namanya kang regy dan kang sakti sangat sigap dan sangat ramah. Akhirnya saya move ke kamar 2201 dengan barang barangn saya yg di bantu packing sangat rapi dan sangat baik tidak ada 1 pun barang yang tertinggal. Terimakasih tebu hotel sangat recommend dan sangat nyaman disini. Terimakasih juga ke kang regy, kang sakti dan staff karyawan yang lainnya yang telah membantu saya.
title: Liburan lebaran

text: Stay di sini buat 5 hari waktu ramadhan hari2 terakhir sampai setelah idul fitri. Nyaman buat bawa anak kecil dan juga orang tua. Deket tempat makan, mini market buat beli jajan anak. Dan deket sm masjid krn kebetulan kemarin sholat idul fitri di sini. Makanannya anak2 juga cocok. sukses terus yah.
title: Nyaman buat keluarga

text: Semalam dibandung kita menghabiskan malam menginap di Tebu, kamarnya nyaman dan bersih dan pelayanan para staff nya bersahabat terimakasih kang regy aa angga sama kaka ela yg telah helpful selama kita menginap d bandung
title: Weekend @tebu

text: Makanannya enak, pelayanannya memuaskan, tempatnya viewnya juga memuaskan, dijamin gaakan ngecewain, tempatnya strategis, masakannya juga kumplit, kalo yang suka seblak boleh nih ke sini, seblaknya terbaiks
title: Buka Bareng @Tebu

text: Saya bersama dengan kawan-kawan dari Jabar U-15 Baseball sangat menikmati makanan dan hidangan dari restoran yang terletak di lantai 9. View dari tempatnya pun sangat bagus karena tempatnya berada di tengah kota. Pelayanannya sangat baik dan ramah.
title: Buka Bersama di Tebu Hotel

text: Makanannya enak dan banyak, pelayanan bagus, menunya juga lengkap ada takjil, minuman,buah buahan, dan makanan utama. Suasana juga bagus dengan pemandangan gedung sate saat malam. harganya juga terjangkau
title: Buka Puasa Bersama

text:
Buka puasa bersama disini seru banget, banyak pilihan makanan dan enak2. Suasana
 nyaman dan menyenangkan.terimakasih banyak tebu hotel. Untuk staff nya ramah ramah, pelayananannya enak dan untuk tempatnya nyaman.

title: Iftar at Tebu Hotel

text: Hari ini saya buka puasa ditebu hotel bersaama teman....seru sekali....view kece nanggung .krn layoutnya kagok buat view .....makanan oke rasa selera nusantara .......oke dengan harganya....refill nya pun cepat..teh nya harum endolitalah pokoknya....cm harga anak2 kurang bersahabat..........

text: Menginap 1 malam di hotel ini, karyawan ramah, kamar dan toilet bersih, banyak kuliner di dekat hotel, hanya dari kamar terdengar suara orang bicara diluar kamar, tempat palinh strategis di kota Bandung

text: Makanan dan pelayanan nya memuaskan..menu makanan nya banyak pilihan..rasanya juga enak..tempatnya nyaman dan cocok buat keluarga apalagi bawa anak kecil..makanan nya juga cocok untuk segala usian..pelayan juga ramah2

title: Iftar @ tebu

text:
Libur panjang kemarin saya coba utk menginap disini. Dibantu oleh FO nya mas Regy ramah dan helpful banget. Walaupun saya dan suami banyak tanya tapi beliau sabar menjawab pertanyaannya. Hehe. Thanks ya mas Regy.
Kamarnya juga nyaman, bersihh. Betah bangettt deh. Recommend bgt jg buat org bandung yg pgn staycation disini.
title: Service excelent, tempat nyaman

text: Hotel minimalis cocok untuk keluarga, Fo nya sangat ramah-ramah, Sangat nyaman sekali, fasilitas nya sangat baik, sangat murah untuk harga backpaker, berada di pusat kota bandung, sangat memudahkan untuk akses jalan-jalan di kota bandung. Sangat Puas pokok nya
title: First impresion

text: Long weekend ini kami sekeluarga datang ke Bandung dan mendapatkan 2 kamar di tebu hotel bandung yang sudah dipesankan jauh jauh hari , sampai hotel agak susah parkir mungkin karena lagi full hotelnya tapi di bantu belldrive yang cepat tanggap melayani tamu yang membawa kendaraan , check in ramah dan cepat dari mas Ardan dan mas Regy namanya , dapat kamar yang view nya luar biasa keren banget di lantai 8 , saat sarapan pagi pun pemandangannya lebih mantep lagi ternyata , makanan enak variasi banyak namun agak menunggu saja karena restoran nya penuh , selebihnya semua oke dari pelayanan sampai kebersihan kamar , terimakasih Tebu Hotel
title: Hotel Minimalis Menyenangkan

text:
Hotelnya bagus, lokasinya strategis, fasilitasnya juga oke..
Terutama bagian receptionisnta juga pada ramah..teruta mas'Regi kalo ga salah namanya..
Thankyou ya mas Regi udah bantu saya waktu saya menginap di Hotel Tebu..
Sukses ya Tebu... :)

good location, near Factory outlet, near restaurant,and friendly staff. very helpful , thanks for the hospitality especially for Mr regy. untuk kamarnya cukup bersih dan nyaman.

title: good location

text: Pertama Masuk  hotel nya nyaman bersih disarming oleh receptionist yang ramah, tempat nya sngat strategis memudahkan saya untuk mencari makan, makasih untuk mas receptionis mas regy sudah membantu saya slama saya mnginap di tebu hotel 👍
title: Ulasan they hotel

text: Cocok untuk menginap dgn budget kuliahan, cocok juga karna dkt dgn pusat perbelanjaan, cafe hits dibandung , apalagi factory outlet yg cukup dekat dan lengkap, dan apalagi mas yg  front office mas regy ramah  awal dtg udh disambut dng senyum grooming oke , kita minta saran tmpt rekreasi lgs dijelasin secara detail juga txyou mas regy, after liburan bakalan nginep lagi deh
title: Good place

text: Makasih tebu,  kamar mandi nya luas ,nyaman buat kita yg berpasangan.  Makasih buat mas regy adik nya uya kuya yg super mirip bgt,  pelayanannya sangat ramat.  Sya puas jauh-jauh dri solo dengan tebu hotel .
title: Puash!!

text: Seminggu lalu saya check in di tebu hotel overall bagus sih kamarnya nyaman, bersih, staff nya ramah2 apalagi mbak ella sangat ramah, tapi sayang wifi nya lemot makanan lumayan bnyak variasinya. Untuk hotel bintang 3 worth it lah harga ramah dikantong. Pasti saya rekomen buat rekan2 saya nginep disini thank tebu hotel
title: Wik wik asik

text: Saya menginap 1 malam di tebu hotel kamarnya bagus, receptionnya ramah namanya mbak ella, kamar sangat bersih dan dekat dengan pusat belanja juga bisa jalan kaki keliling sekitaran jalan riau. Next time saya akan menginap lagi di tebu hotel
title: Exellent service

text: Saya baru kali ini liburan ke bandung dan menginap di tebu hotel, saya puas dengan semua pelayanannya, kamarnya bersih, good view, karyawannya sangat ramah dan terimakasih juga kepada mas regy di bagian front office nya yang banyak membantu saya memberitahu tentang bandung. Next saya pasti datang lagi ke hotel ini.
title: Hotel Recommend, good view

text: Beberapa bulan setelah saya stay di sini saya berkesempatan datang lg ke bandung dan memilih lg tempat istirahat yg sama d Hotel Tebu, kebetulan dapat tempat yg tinggi dan mendapatkan View yg bagus, pas cari makan di tengah malah dibantu sama kang angga front desknya yg humoris dan informatif, well mgkn klo k bandung lg saya akan ke sini lg, good price good view clean room pokoknya cocok buat pelancong atau p
title: Second Time @ Bandung

text: Karyawan yang ramah dan suasana kamar yang nyaman dengan view kota bandung yang indah membuat saya betah berada dikamar, menu sarapan yang enak hanya saja tidak ada smoking area saat breakfast membuat saya sedikit kurang nyaman.
title: Hotel recomend dengan suasana yang tenang dan memiliki view kota bandung

text:
Pertama masuk lobby nya kok kecil ya agak sempit, tapi baru masuk lobby udah di sediakan welcome drink, dan pelayan dari receptionnya ramah pada saat check in , untuk kamarnya overall good kebetulan saya dapat view yang ke gedung sate jadi bagus sekali. Para karyawannya ramah ramah sekali, salam hangat untuk mas regy di bagian reception yang ramah dan dapat membantu saya. Saya senang menginap disini kan saya akan berkunjung kembali kesini. 

Terimakasih tebu hotel
title: Holiday

text:
Terima kasih Tebu Hotel Bandung atas kamarnya yang bersih nyaman pemandangan bagus dan sarapan yang lengkap . 3 hari di bandung merasa nyaman akses kemanapun mudah sekali menginap di hotel tebu . staff hotel ramah dan sangat membantu dalam setiap kebutuhan yang kami inginkan 

Terima kasih next kami kembali lagi 
Salam hangat buat mas Angga yang oke dan helpful
title: Small But Cozy

text: Kamar nyaman,bersih,kamar mandi ok,makanan ok,dan...yg paling asyik lokasinya dekat tempat kuliner,fashion dan mesjid.Recommended pokoknya.Ngga perlu transportasi untuk dapatkan itu semua.Cukup jalan kaki keluar hotel.
title: Minimize but optimize

text: Tebu TOP banget deh... Lokasinya strategis bgt utk penggemar kuliner.. Dikelilingi kuliner khas bandung..yg paling penting hotelnya bersih... View dari restorannya mantap.. Makanan enak dan boleh late check out😍
title: Holiday

text: Selama di hotel ini pelayanan ramah dan sangat membantu. Dekat untuk ke tempat hiburan maupun Factory outlet. Fasilitas lumayan lengkap. Makanan pun enak. Tapi tempat parkir kurang banyak sehingga parkir diluar hotel. 3q2
title: Hotel Dekat Kota

text: Hotel bintang 3 yg lumayan, pelayanan nya engga banget. Requestnya apa di kasihnya apa, breakfast di loteng sempit dan makanan nya biasa aja. FO nya biasa aja. Pelayanan nya kurang oke, yang oke cuma letak nya aja di pinggir jalan dekat Factory outlet dan tempat nongkrong, parkir terbatas dan yah lumayan lah.
title: Lumayan dari pada lumanyun

text: Service nya hotel tebu keren,  mulai dari check in di kamar di set up cake dan balon2 tambah welcome drink,  sarapan yang enak dan lengkap,  bintang 3 punya stall tomyum itu oke banget dan ada makanan tradisional  pecel kediri yang jarang ditemui di hotel lain,  untuk kamar nya juga oke cuma wifi kurang oke aja selebihnya top semua deh puas
title: Service Top

text: Di lokasi menarik dengan harga terjangkau, menawarkan kamar bersih dengan fasilitas ++ untuk sekelas hotel budget, mgkn apabila anda mencari hotel dengan budget bisa di rekomend hotel ini... Thank you tebu hotel
title: Tmpat Strategis dengan harga terjangkau

text: Menginap di tebu hotel 1 malam ditemani faislitas okeb, mulai dari sarapan sampai farewell check out yang ramah ditambah lagi nemu event seru di tebu ada bazzar barang branded pula kaya seperti one stop shoping nih liburannya , keren pula dapat harga seafood 65 ribu habis belanja di bazzar , oke deh puas bangetb
title: Liburan Desember

text: Tebu hotel terima kasih sudah memberikan pelayanan bagus saat check in , sarapan oke kamar bagus orang orang ramah dan baik banyak kuliner enak dan jajanan bandung beserta fashion market yang oke untuk di bawa pulang
title: Holiday

text:
Bagus..baik..servis terbaik.

Check in disambut ramah oleh team front officce dan bellboy semua dapat welcome drink dan semua diarahkan pad bilik masing masing , banyak kuliner depan hotel dengan harga oke membuat betah disini
title: Holiday

text: Tebu hotel ini punya kamar yang minimalis tapi pas dan menarik dengan view yang keren,  kamar super bersih dan rapih,  sayang wifi nya kurang memuaskan,  untuk sarapan oke apalagi kalo malem malem laper kita bisa langsung kuliner di sekitaran hotel karena banyak banget tempat kuliner top,  sukses terus tebu hotel
title: Kamar super bersih

text: Liburan ke bandung cari hotel yang nyaman lokasi dekat ke kota saya dapat ti Tebu Hotel jl riau ini , mendapatkan kamar yang cozy banget style anak muda dan mendapatkan view yang mantapp dari jendela kamar , malamnya asik juga lagi ngidam seafood ternyata hotel ini juga punya restoran ala2 jalanan dan jualan berbagai menu seafood yang enak , top banget deh jadi ga usah makan2 jauh keluar , thanks tebu hotel
title: Hotel sekaligus culinery

title: Great Value Hotel

text:
Lokasinya sangat strategis dan tidak jauh dari pusat perekonomian meskipun daerahnya cukup padat oleh arus lalu lintas kendaraan serta agak bising.

Luas kamar sudah memadai untuk ukuran dua orang maupun untuk keluarga. Desain interior dalam kamar juga bagus dengan kesan minimalis dan indah. Fasilitas di dalam kamar seperti pendingin ruangan (AC), pemanas air, lampu/pencahayaan, perlengkapan kamar mandi serta sarana air bersih (kran) sudah memadai. Untuk saluran televisi dari luar masih kurang jumlahnya dan sebaiknya dapat ditambah lagi, sehingga para tamu yang menginap dapat lebih leluasa memilih saluran yang diinginkan. 

Kebersihan kamar terjaga dengan baik, hal ini yang utama dalam memberikan kenyamanan bagi para tamu/pengunjung yang datang untuk menginap/bermalam di sini. Kondisi tempat tidur baik dan kasur, bantal-bantal serta selimut terasa empuk, nyaman dan tidak membuat punggung menjadi sakit atau pegal. 

Makan pagi/sarapan yang disediakan cukup enak untuk disantap, hanya saja menunya kurang bervariasi dan kurang banyak jenisnya. Khususnya untuk makanan ringan seperti kue-kue. Minuman yang tersedia pada saat sarapan juga sudah memadai, meliputi air putih, teh, susu, kopi, jus buah-buahan. Sebagai masukan, mungkin bisa ditambahkan bajigur atau bandrek sebagai minuman khas daerah setempat. 

Lobby hotel dan tempat registrasi perlu diperluas lagi karena yang ada saat ini terasa sempit dan sesak, terutama pasa saat liburan panjang dimana banyak tamu yang datang untuk menginap. Cukup sulit untuk bisa duduk selama menunggu/antri mendaftar karena keterbatasan tempat yang tersedia dan kurangnya sarana berupa bangku/kursi tamu.

Area parkir juga perlu ditambah, tempat yang sempit membuat para tamu susah untuk bisa mendapatkan posisi parkir mobil yang nyaman dengan baik. Sebagai saran, mungkin bisa dibuatkan basement untuk menanggulangi hal ini.

title: Lokasi bagus

text: Sesampai nya disana, kami sekeluarga langsung check in dan diantar keatas oleh petugas, dan untuk yang membawa mobil, parkir nya bisa di GF, atau di atas, mobil anda akan di bawa keatas menggunakan lift, tapi untuk yang mobil nya ukuran cukup besar, berhati hati saat di setiap belokan pada saat ingin turun, karena padaa saat turun tidak pakai lift. Sampai di kamar, kamar ini ada 3 kasur, 1 kasur ukuran king di bawah,1 ukuran king diatas, dan ukuran single bed diatas juga, kamar mandi 1 di bawah, dan 2 TV atas dan bawah, dan yang menjadi kekurangan adalah AC hanya 1,ditaruh di atas,tapi juga mengarah ke bawah, tapi untuk iklim di Bandung yang terbilang dingin, jadi kekurangan itu tertutupi. Untuk yang dapat kamar dekat tangga darurat dan lantai yang tinggi, kalian beruntung, karena bisa menikmati sunrise, dan juga sangat dingin saat keluar di pagi hari, tapi jangan lupa mengganjal pintu darurat nya ya, karena kalau tertutup, dan posisi kalian di luar, kalian tidak bisa masuk. Dan untuk di lantai paling atas ada kolam renang, kolam nya kecil, outdoor, jadi sangat dingin kalau kalian mau berenang, ada cafe juga, ada sauna, ada tempat fitness. Setelah itu tempat makan, disini kalian tidak usah takut kalau kalian ga suka makanan makanan tertentu, karena disini di sajikan sangat banyak jenis makanan (saya lupa, tapi ada makanan khas khas daerah) dan juga ada live cooking. Banyak sekali minuman, ada susu, jus, kopi, teh, DLL. saran buat yang pergi beramai ramai, kalau ada yang mau keluar kamar mending semua ikut, karena untuk mengakses lift keatas harus menggunakan kartu yang di taruh di kamar yang digunakan untuk mengaktifkan listrik di kamar. So, happy Holiday

text:
Pertama kali saya tiba, di depan resepsionis saya didiamkan, bahkan disapapun tidak.  Baru setelah saya diam sekitar 10 menit, resepsionis yang (sepertinya pura-pura) sibuk melayani saya.

Proses reservasi cepat, dan saya segera mendapat kamar yang sesuai dalam gambar.  Sayangnya fasilitas kamar mandinya di ruang 5511 yang saya tempati kurang baik.  Showernya rusak (bagian belakangnya pecah) sehingga air tidak bisa menyemprot dengan baik.  Juga handuknya seperti sudah buluk, kotor dan kaku.

Parkiran sempit, satpam responnya lambat saat saya kesulitan mencari tempat parkir.

Tapi kelebihannya, hotel ini lokasinya sangat strategis dengan harga yang relatif murah.

text:
Ekspektasi tidak terlalu besar mengingat lebih tergolong hotel budget. Ketika masuk pun, ruang parkir sudah terlihat terbatas. Untuk bertemu resepsionis, perlu naik dari ground floor ke lt. 1 yang juga biasa di pakai breakfast. Namun, untuk kelas budget, hotel yang bulan november 2016 masuk usia 2 tahun ini punya banyak keasikan dibanding pesaing di kelasnya.

Pelayanan dan petugas ramah. Welcome drink-nya unik karena katanya menyajikan air tebu asli. Segar. Ruangan/kamar terawat dan bersih. Tidak terlalu berisik dan bisa lihat view bandung dari rooftop. Di weekend bahkan bisa nikmati sarapan dan pemandangan kota bandung dari lantai puncak. Variasi menu sarapan per hari oke dan rasanya tidak mengecewakan. Ruangannya pun cozy dan ada pilihan.

Karena terletak kurang lebih di sentra Riau, mudah jika ingin menikmati kuliner, jajanan, atau wisata belanja di sana. Memindai jalan aceh atau jogging ke GOR Saparua pun oke. Ke pusat-pusat lain bandung juga sangat nyaman.

text: Baru pertama kali menginap di hotel bertema mini, skinny dan funky ini. Ditawari oleh agen travel di bandara rekomendasinya karena baru dan dekat tempat belanja dan makan. Pertama masuk kamar langsung mata saya mengirim pesan ke hati menyatakan suka. Kamar yang saya tempati berukuran 15 m2 alias superior. Meski berukuran tidak luas namun terasa lega. Mau minum teh atau kopi di kamar juga disediakan. Sarapan lumayan ada bubur ayam dan lontong dengan kuahnya berisi daging serta roti dan minuman jus. Yang penting buat nyari makan dan shopping di FO tingggal melangkah di jalan LRE martadinata alias jalan riau ini. Saya kalau bawa keluarga mau kembali lagi ke sini. Satu hal kalau instansi tempat anda bekerja sudah memiliki kerjasama dengan hotel ini maka rate yang ditawarkan di bawah harga diskon hotel lho.

text:
Sebuah hotel baru di jalan Riau. Tidak jauh dari Taman Pramuka, hanya selemparan kaki dari KFC Riau, dan cukup dekat dari masjid Istiqamah. Ditambah akses yang mudah ke BIP / Dago, dan di sekitar hotel terdapat FO, kafe, restoran dan pusat jajanan, membuat dari segi lokasi hotel ini sudah memiliki keunggulan tersendiri.

Memasuki area hotel, yang dari depan masih sangat terlihat bekas pengerjaan. Karena ternyata hotel ini memang masih proses penyelesaian.

Bangunannya kutilang, kurus, tinggi, langsing. Pintu masuk saat itu menjorok ke dalam. Melewati area parkir.

Memasuki lobi, eh ternyata bukan lobi. Lantai dasar masih belum jelas untuk apa selain saya melihat toilet dan musholla. Diberitahu oleh keamanan kalau resepsionis dan lobi ada di lantai satu.

Akhirnya saya menaiki tangga, meski sebenarnya ada lift tapi nanggung aja kalau hanya satu lantai. Kemudian mendapati lobi yang (masih) bersatu dengan restoran dan resepsionis yang nampak menyatu dengan 'kassa' restorannya. AlhamduliLlaah proses check in mudah dan cepat, boleh langsung masuk kamar meski baru pukul 13.00. Kalau tidak, agak bingung juga hendak menunggu dimana. Mengingat kondisi 'lobi' yang demikian.

Lorong menuju kamar nampak terang, karena di sisinya terdapat jendela. Konsep bangunan hotel ini membuat saya mendapati kesan jauh sekali ke kamar dari lift. Kebetulan kamar saya memang di dekat ujung.

Menempati kamar tipe superior, kesan pertama ialah tidak luas meski apik. Hanya berkisar 15 meter persegi, tentu kurang nyaman bila berdua. Untung saya sendirian saja. Jadi dari segi luas, saya tidak begitu mempermasalahkan.

Fasilitas dan konsep kamar, saya menyukainya. Cukup lengkap, meski dengan ketiadaan kulkas dan pengering rambut tapi itu dapat dimaklumi. Kasurnya nyaman. Hanya saja, rak di pojok dekat pintu terasa kecil sekali.

Kamar mandi cukup lah, tidak luas tapi juga tidak sempit. Nyaman meski tanpa pembatas area shower dan toilet. Peralatan mandi disediakan cukup lengkap. Air panas juga mengalir dengan baik.

Terkait berselancar di dunia maya, kecepatan dari jaringan internet gratis yang disediakan boleh diandalkan. Mengaksesnya pun cukup mudah. Meski terkadang saya mendapati sinyal yang sesekali terputus saat di kamar.

Saluran TV, tidak terlalu banyak. Kadang siaran yang ditangkap juga 'macet'. TV-nya sih besar, sehingga nyaman menontonnya.

Saat sarapan, sedikit kecewa. Variasi menu tidak banyak, dari segi rasa juga kurang mantap. Cangkir kopi atau tehnya besar sekali, berbanding terbalik dengan gelas air mineral / jus yang teramat kecil. Tapi mengingat harga, apa yang ditawarkan saat sarapan sudah cukup istimewa.

Sebagai hotel yang katanya bintang 3, tentu sangat jauh dari harapan. Namun dari harga yang saat itu hanya 300ribuan saja, apa yang saya dapatkan ditambah lokasi yang istimewa tentu sudah terbayarkan. Hanya tinggal merapihkan kondisi hotel, juga membenahi sedikit fasilitas seperti siaran TV kabel dan internet agar tidak tersendat.

Sebuah hotel yang bisa dijadikan alternatif menginap bagi yang ingin menghabiskan waktu di Bandung untuk wisata kuliner dan wisata belanja. Bila ingin bersama keluarga, pesanlah kamar deluxe atau 90 degree yang lebih bisa memberikan kenyamanan saat di kamar.
title: Ini (Katanya) Bintang 3?

text:
Spent my new year's eve at this hotel.

My first impression was that this hotel was tall... And skinny. They provided vallet parking service as they didn't have a large parking lot. Receptionist was on the 1st floor instead of on the ground floor and it was kinda weird. It was busy at that time but didn't take too long for me to check in.

I booked my superior room with a double bed via Traveloka app and asked them to give me a room facing the city. And they gave me what I wanted, it was on the 8th floor (a smoking room tho, but it didn't smell bad). 

I entered my room and amazed by the view I saw. The room had huge window facing the city and once again, it was an amazing view. But it was so bright and made my room felt hot the air conditioner couldn't handle it. Room wasn't big nor small so it was enough. 

Apparently they had a new year's eve party on their "rooftop" at that night (I don't agree with them saying it was a rooftop since it wasn't a rooftop at all, only highest room on their hotel not even an open space where you can see the surrounding's view). And I could hear noises from there into my room when they rehearsed and it was kinda disturbing since I wanted to take a nap.

Bathroom was small and didn't have any separation between the shower and the toilet not even a curtain. They provided amenities such as toothbrush, toothpaste, soap, shampoo, haircap and comb. No hairdryer. 

They gave 2 still waters, coffees and teas. Water cattle was working good. They also provided an ironing board and an iron.

I didn't realize that dinner was included on my room rate that night. So, they gave plenty of choices for dinner but they really need to pay attention on the taste. Same thing goes to the breakfast. Plenty of choices but the food tasted plain.

Overall, this is a good budget hotel with a superb view from the 8th floor. Will stay there again next time.
title: Superb View from 8th Floor

text:
I stayed with a friend for a night, and we booked room only (without breakfast). But you can also book with breakfast included.

The room is clean. It is perfect for 2 adults. It has everything you need.
The hotel's location is near to factory outlet, boutique, restaurants..

We were coming from Jakarta, and drove our own car. But you even did not need the car, because everything is within walking distance from the hotel.

As the hotel name is tebu (sugarcane -in English), they provide sugarcane juice as the welcome drink. Very nice! :)

text: The room is small, just nice for 2 persons stay, with modern design and comfort bed. However, the room size might not be suitable if both of you bring the 24 or 28 inch trolley luggage as you might require extra space to open your bag. Toilet and the towels provided are clean. Breakfast menu is just so-so. The location of this hotel is just perfect and within walking distance to the Factory Outlets along Jalan Riau. There is also a convinient store nearby the hotel. In addition to that, u can also find HokBen Restaurant (Halal) nearby the hotel, which still operates until 10pm. Definitely this hotel will still be in my choices list for the next visit to Bandung.
title: Small room in a perfect location

text:
I booked this hotel for a friend. I was so embarrassed because my friend actually complains about their service. Since he arrived a day early for a meeting, he decided to catch up with work and stay in the room. When he tried to order room service, they received his order. Five minutes later the room service called back and told him that all foods are sold out. How weird????

Check in also quite funny. I have to pay (using cash) Rp. 100.000 for key deposit. I never been in a hotel that need to deposit for key card. Parking also very bad, and very little space. 

The worst part of it, when my friend complains regarding the room service the front office....the employee told him that since they're budget hotel, so they don't have kitchen. How come they have menu in the room then? What about breakfast??? 

This hotel is a disaster.
title: Room Service is not available

text:
I'm impressed with the cleanliness of this hotel. The hotel feels compact and modern. And that goes with the facilities. The room is small but it is well designed, you can move around freely. There's no frill here. No refrigerator, no hair dryer. no drawer (who needs it anyway :D). But the TV channel is good. Keep in mind they will charge you if you ask for extra item like toothbrush etc.
The room service last order is at 9 PM. But there's a KFC around the corner. And plenty of good resto nearby. You cold also buy Soes Merdeka for its famous choux, it located just across the hotel.
Now for the breakfast, food taste was OK, not much to choose though, but they were understaff. Especially the egg corner, it's really slow. I like egg, so it matters :D
All and all, it's recommended for short term stay.
title: Clean and compact budget hotel, if you don't mind the food though ...

text: We stayed in tebu hotel for 3 nights and the service we received was better than those 4star or 5star hotels, staff is just amazing especially the ones at reception who is ready to help you anytime, room boy who cleans the room is very talented and dedicated. We will remember Amaya and Gulemar, people who touched our hearts with their wonderful service. The location is another good thing airport is 15min ride from hotel, factory outlets like heritage passion and secret warehouse is just walkable distance from here, a lot of nice restaurants nearby. We were welcomed with some sweets, though the hotel food menu is limited the quality is pretty amazing. Room is not very sound proof but less noisy compared to 4stars we stayed before. Hotel has good wifi, no pool, has restaurant but open for breakfast only. Room service is available until 11 pm. Breakfast starts at 6am limited choices but tasty and enough to fuel your body. We stayed in superior room it was good enough for 2 of us, toothbrush, comb were provided but no hair dryer. There is locker in room but no mini fridge. Tip stay on high floor if possible at end room as the traffic is horrendous you dont want to spoil your holiday with horn sound from road. I would like to take this opportunity to thank all the amazing staff of tebu hotel especially the room cleaners and amaya for their dedication to their job and for giving my wife an excellent birthday surprise in the middle of the night, all staff came to our room singing happy birthday at middle of the night and it was a complimentary surprise with a cake. Thankyou tebu hotel. We will stay here again when we travel Bandung.
title: Excellent service, location, hospitality and room

text:
The hotel feels new. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Bed is comfortable. Staff is great. The "wood" paneling makes the room feel very finished. It is a very likable place. I highly recommend.  It just felt good to be there.  Cleanliness was exceptional.

I liked the neighborhood.  It was just steps from some nice coffee shops (such as Two Cents Coffee) and restaurants (including the spacious and comfortable 90 Gourmet down the street).  And close to shopping that wouldn't interest most Westerners.

It deserves the excellent rating I gave it, but it has minor "Asian" issues.  The breakfast was Indonesian (rice, chicken), whereas I prefer eggs. Coffee was really poor. Regular noise from my neighbors, housekeeping, and plumbing. I regularly heard furniture being moved around while lying in bed.  I slept with earplugs and was fine.  Room was fine as a solo traveler.  Two people with two large suitcases could be uncomfortable.  Wifi was often marginal- it dropped semi-regularly and the speeds were just enough to not be problematic.  I often supplemented their dropped wifi with my mobile connection.  Better for personal use than for when one has business commitments (as I did).

Despite the minor tradeoffs, I loved the place and would recommend it to anyone.  It seems like a great template to turn into a hotel chain.
title: Great Hotel

text:
Me and hubby were staying in the hotel from the 2nd november to 6th november..
The hotel was new.For facilities wise we hope they have more -like for example,a small little fridge that we thought will be usefull for us.No room service for ordering food to the room was a little bit of a dissapointment too as we was very lazy to be searching for food after a long day tour outside.But being a hotel near to the local supermarts and small little cafes is a consultation as we need not go far when we get hungry at night.
But what really opened our eyes was the superb customer service each and every single employee of Tebu Hotel.Never were we left without their acknowledgements.Their warm smiles and friendly faces never failed to make us happy.From the receptions,to securities,cleaners,waiter/helpers...all of them are really polite and friendly!!! Being in the customer service line myself,I wish I could "steal" them to be my team at work in Singapore.Kudos to them and keep the good work. 
Thumbs up to the breakfast buffet too.They are delicious and the spread was good.
Will sure recommed friends to stay in Tebu.👍

text:
Stayed here on Superior Room for a night with my husband. Get best deal from Expedia excluding breakfast. So I didn't try their breakfast and won't review it.

The Superior Room was clean in modern-minimalist design, not spacious. But surely the bed was super comfortable. The blanket was fluffy, me likey! The bathroom also in minimalist design, with shower. In room wifi connection was good, TV channel vary from local to international channel, and the room has a floor to ceiling window (huge!). The best part was, I got room on 7 or 8th floor (2nd highest floor for sure) and it was facing Bandung city which at night I got a wonderful city light view in the room. For sure, I wouldn't get the same view if I was on a lower level because it was blocked by Serela Hotel next to it.

Location is strategic, on Jl. Riau (RE Martadinata) next to Serela Hotal. Still within walking distance and public transport access to Factory Outlet, cafe in jalan Progo, Bank Mandiri, KFC, CK, and some restaurant like Bebek Van Java.

Parking area is limited though.

Surely, I had a pleasant stay in Tebu hotel, and it's definitely going on my top list budget-but-awesome-hotel-to-stay in Bandung.
title: Budget Hotel with Awesome City View Room

text:
Booking & Transfer
We stayed in Tebu Hotel for 2 nights in early March.  Made a booking through Expedia and emailed to Willson Hospitality for airport transfer arrangement prior our visit.  My email was replied the following day both by Willson Hospitality and Tebu Hotel.  We arrived in Bandung on Wednesday late morning and Tebu Hotel staff was already there to pick us up.

Reception & Checking-In
The reception area is located on the first floor (1 floor up from ground level) and at the other end from hotel entrance.  Therefore, you won’t be seeing reception area upon your arrival.  However, they do have security guards at the entrance who are always ready to direct you to where to head to.  We reached the hotel around 12noon and the checking in was fast, with no hassle.  

The Room
We booked for a standard room.  The size is quite ok, not too small.  The bed is good.  The bathroom worked well.  And the place is clean.  We were given a room on the 7th floor.  The view is nice.  Wi-fi is also provided and we have no problem accessing to the internet. 
They do not have a mini fridge though.  And it would be good to have a dressing mirror in the room as there’s only a mirror in the bathroom and it is quite a hassle to get ready when someone is occupying it.

Breakfast
Breakfast was simple yet satisfactory, mostly Indonesian cuisine but was nice.  For the price that I paid for the stay...breakfast is like a complimentary.  And I’m grateful.  The restaurant is simple and pleasant. 

Location
The location is good too.  It is along Jalan Riau, walking distance to factory outlets and cafes.  It is very convenient.

Staffs
They are very friendly, polite and helpful.  Mr Rifai, the Hotel Manager was nice to approach us to find out about our stay in the hotel.

All in all…it was a good stay.  Will consider staying in the hotel again.
title: New Hotel in an Good Location

Clean bathroom, however would have been better if there was a separate shower stall. Breakfast simple, catering to more local/Asian taste. KFC next door, a good cafe across the street and other restaurants within walking distance. Location is also a plus point for those who love shopping as the famous factory outlets are on the other end of the street. Friendly and helpful staff. Great stay and will return.
title: Good price, rooms, location and fast internet

text: exelent place,comfort room,good hospitality,good price,nice view,peacefull room hospitalty,quiet simple,good food,recomended hotel for vacation and business because in the middle of martadinata street
title: comfort hotel in Bandung City

text:
I had meeting here and booked a room for one night. But, I wont stayed anymore at this hotel. 

First, the staffs were not friendly and helpful. Even a smile that you deserved. During the reservation, the staff was not providing you a hintful assistance. It seemed that if you had your booking in this hotel, then you didnt have much choice for service. You're my guest, and you had nothing for a choice.

Secondly, I had booked a smoking room. but I got non smoking one. And I had go to ground floor, just in front of the gate to smoke. I thought the hotel had missed the regulations for smoking forbiding. If a public facility didnt allowed the quests to smoke, then facility must provide a decent access to smoke. Smoking was not illegal though, and the smokers paid the taxes for that. So, everytime I wanted to smoke, then I must go to the in front of the gate. While people were going in and out. It was not safe as well, the vehicles were passing by to drop off the passengers.

Then, when I wanted to have breakfast, and I asked for smoking access, the staff pointed another room, just in the other corner of the floor. And she said that you could have your meal at that place. But when I walked to that place, I found nothing just some chairs and tables. No prepared food and drinks. So, the guest must took the foods and drinks at the another building, then bring them to this area. But what if you brought your belongings? You must put them in the smoking area, without any surveilance of staffs, then walked to the main area to take the foods and drinks. There was no guarantee that your belongings were safe. 

Luckily, I only stayed for one night and half day meeting. I wont stayed here for any reasons in the future. This was the worst experience that I had in staying in lodging facilities.

I also wont recommend this hotel for you who were smoking. There were some other hotels nearby for your preferences.

For the hotel management, maybe you should put a sign for your hotel that showed no smoking accesses in your hotel. Or, maybe it would be better if you mentioned that smoking is illegal action.

Again, I wont stayed here again in the futute.
title: The Most Awful Experience

text: The hotel is very peaceful, near to all the factory outlets and very convenient..staffs are friendly..breakfast is okay..the room is clean and tidy..very recommended to couples or even families to stay here..
title: Nice hotel!

text: We spent two nights in this hotel when I, my wife, and our son visited Bandung. The place is clean and comfy. In addition to that, the staff are nice and welcome. The wi-fi works too. You just can go to places near the hotel simply by walking.

text: I was shock when i came because its lobby spot, it is not in the front of the hotel but you have to go inside after parking. And dont forget its location is in the center of shopping and culinary street which is perfect for tourist.

text:
الفندق نظيف جدا .. و وجبة الإفطار  لذيذة .. صح الغرف صغيرة لكن نظام الغرف المتصلة أوجد  الحل لنا  كعائلة  .. موقعه قريب من معظم الأماكن السياحية  و بجنبه  مطاعم  كثيرة خصوصا kfc و ايضأ سوبر ماركت ... و تعامل الموظفين جدا راقي ، ، خصوصا الموظفة الرائعة في تعاملها Ella ... كانت متعاونة  و مبتسمة دائما و تحاول المساعدة .. شكرا لكل موظف في  tebu hotel  .. أتمنى مستقبلا إضافة ثلاجات للغرف .

text:
The room was nice, clean, and the amenities were acceptable for 3 stars hotel.
Hair dryer and iron are available by request. The size of room was enough for 1 person but bit small for two people. Bathroom and towels were clean, they provide shampoo/soap, tooth brush, and hair cover.
The breakfast was standard and the location is convenient, located in re martadinata street (riau) where many factory outlets around. If you are in Bandung for shopping, this is a good hotel for you.

title: Nice experience

text: Good place for groups, they have great food, the hotel has easy access to shopping areas.. What more do i want ..sangat menjimatkan kerana harga murah berpatutan, biliknya sesuai dgn harga dan senang jalan ke shopping area
title: Wow

text:
- Room Cozy 
- Breakfast with Nice View at 9th Floor (Bandung Town View) 
- Easy access to anywhere. 
- Riau Outlet location 
- Friendly Staff
- Hotel Massage offer 225k per pax
- Can add on extra bed @250k IDR
- Clean and room is tidy 
- Reasonable Rate
title: COZY and GOOD LOCATION

text: Nice place with comfort room, near to recreation in bandung. I hope can stay again in another day with my family. I hope another day can have a more discount in room price and can be a member in tebu hotel bandung.
title: One Night Stay

text: i stayed for 1 night on 3rd floor. from the front gate, i thought that the hotel is small, but actually is quite large. the room is tidy and spacious, and also have a big window so i can see the view of Jalan Riau from my room. the restaurant is good and has a good food as well. overall, i enjoyed my stay. thank you.
title: minimalis and nice

text: We stayed here for 1 night as we wanted to see some sites of the area and city. We saw a few active volcano locations and experienced the fantastic view as you enter the city. Bandung is surrounded by mountains and when you come through the many passes the view of the city can be spectacular! The people of Bandung were all very friendly and it added to the pleasure of being there.
title: Fantastic small hotel in the middle of the city

photos.caption: View from our room on 6th floor

text: We stayed here for 4 days and 3 nights and the room we got was simple, decent but has the modern feel into it. The amenities are quite nice but the channels on the TV are very limited to local channels but that's totally fine with us since we are focused on our mobile devices since they offer free WiFi. They also have free breakfast for their guests and they get to clean your room each day for you to be sure that when you go out and go back to the hotel,  its clean and comfy (Make sure to lock your luggages and bags you left in your hotel room).The hotel staffs and cleaners are very kind and considerate and when we are about to check out, we assumed that we are not eligible for a free breakfast anymore but the helpdesk even offered us to eat before we leave. Overall, I highly recommend this hotel for budget travellers and also to everyone who wants to visit Bandung.
title: Budget hotel for travellers

photos.caption: Our room. On the right side is a glass which will be the shower room

text:
My stay was ok, I stayed for a night, the room is slightly bigger as compared to other hotels with the same category, But the bathroom is so tiny.
I got the room in the corner and it was quiet and I loved it.
title: Nothing Special

text:
The hotel is affordable, quite nice rooms, however when we had a problem and asked the staff to help us, they just simply didn't care.

We value good service, and even though it is cheap and affordable, we would not choose to stay in this hotel ever again. 

Thank you Tebu Hotel for this experience!
title: An OK hotel, with poor attitude of its staff

text: The location of the hotel is excellent for shoppers. Walking distance to Cascade, Heritage (Jl. Riau). Room is adequately enough for Asian size but big sizes might encounter discomfort especially the bathroom. Wifi can be improved more as it kept on disconnected all the time. All in all, good place for those that spend most of their time enjoying Bandung town.
title: Shopping spree at Jl. Riau

text: Me and my husband stayed for one night at weekend and got impressed with the hotel. The location is very good, located in the heart of shopping street and made us easier to shop when we done it at sunday morning. The food was good even the rooftop too small and we had to breakfast behind the pantry. The room we stayed was deluxe room and the view was so nice also the bathroom was clean and spacious. Instead not having refrigerator in the room i could deposit my breastfeed milk on the reception desk. The staffs were very helpful too.
title: Perfect budget hotel

text:
I'm staying for couple of days as the hotel location is strategic within the crowd center of Bandung. The room are small (15 m2) but well designed clean and felt comfy. 

There some notes while we checked in the room are clean but somehow the house keeper forgot to check the amenities such as tea/coffee stirrer which appears used previously and dirty but still in the plate. We also try to call reception to pickup laundry, but no one pickup the phone after few call. Then we intend to fillup the laundry form our self and found the yellow copy is tear up and only half form left. We decided to not making any tea or laundry. 

Breakfast located at 9th floor which have a good morning air breeze and offers a beautiful city view at the same time. Menu are limited and very basic, taste are average.  We order an omlette came in small thin and very oily. Hotel charged 100K per pax for additional breakfast which I found really expensive and not worth even when comparing to other 4 stars hotels in the area which offers more in their menus and only charge for 85K per pax.
title: Small & Comfy with some notes.

text:
Location: Very good location as it walking distance from a few factory outlets and eating outlets. Worse comes to worse, there is a KFC next door.
Room: Clean. Bed was comfortable. But size was a bit small. Good for one person. If two persons staying, may be a bit cramped. 
Bathroom: No separate shower room. So the whole bathroom (plus your toilet seat) would get wet after a shower. 
Breakfast: Average. No fancy food. Just the ordinary menu with little choice.
Parking: A disaster! Very limited and difficult layout making it difficult to park. 
If you have other options with same price, I suggest you find another hotel to stay.
title: Good location

text:
This is a newish property (I was the first to use my room's safe deposit box), so the rooms are rather clean and comfortable.  Excellent location on Riau too.

(BTW, Nasi Bancakan and Warung Nasi Bu Eha are decent traditional Sundanese eateries nearby, whereas Pasar Cisangkuy also nearby offers a giant menu of Indonesian dishes in a chilled laidback ambience. Ask the hotel for directions.)

It was frustrating dealing with room allocation errors (like reviewer Rahadhian attested to a few reviews down), slippery/shady service, and staff who had trouble communicating in English, so housekeeping manager Nugraha was a doll in contrast: his helpfulness, graciousness and realiability was a much-appreciated beacon of light. So thank you Mr Nugraha for your hospitality.
title: New property on Riau

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
First impression, its a trendy & fresh new hotel. But, it didn't last long. Checked in around 2.30pm,the unwelcoming cold faces standing behind the reception counter didn't greet us or even bother to smile at us not until We smile first at them. Tried to be positive and thought maybe they had a rough shift today. Although that should not be an excuse for being less friendly toward your guest.
The 90" view room we checked into was on the 3rd floor, looked as good as the picture on the web but once we entered the room temperature was too hot. Immediately,we turned the AC on full blast and hope it'd cool down soon. The next hour,when my son used the toilet then I realised the bidet hose was broken and can't be use. My husband reported it by phone to reception straight away,and they said they'll send someone to fix it. But up until we checked out the next day no one came to fix it. Did the staff even bother to write our report down on their log book? It surely is a case of lack of attention and communication and poor coordination amongst the staff.

There were 2 queen bed in that room, my son and I slept on the upstairs bed, while my other son slept with my husband downstairs. We were tired so we drifted off easily but we were awaken in the middle of the night sweating and the upstairs area felt so hot. I went down to check on my other son and once I got down it was so freezing and my husband said he couldn't turned down/off the AC because then my son and I would feel stuffier than it already was. In the morning my son who slept upstairs woke up with a headache while my other son had the cold due to the freezing AC. My husband and I immediately decided to check out and cancelled our initial plan to stay there until the weekend.
During check out,my husband asked to see the Manager and reported everything. The kind Manager apologized and promised to report our complaints directly to the hotel owner. 
Hopefuly, our series of unfortunate experiences can be taken into consideration so there will be no other disgruntled guests in the future.
title: Bad service, broken bidet hose, hot room

text:
Hier twee nachten verbleven. Mooie kamers, niet super ruim als je twee grote valiezen bij hebt. Vriendelijk personeel. Ontbijt is in orde. Vele gezellige restaurantjes in de buurt, zeker eens de moeite om rond te gaan kijken. 
Veel lawaai 's nachts dus oordopjes zijn een must
title: Hotel voor twee nachten

text: Hotel ligt op een prima locatie om Bandung wandelend te verkennen. Kamers zijn voldoende ruim en schoon met een leuk uitzicht over een deel van Bandung , geen balkon. Modern en sfeervol gedecoreerd. Personeel vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Het ontbijt biedt op zich voldoende keus maar toen wij er waren was alles maar dan ook alles op. Logistiek ging dit allemaal niet zo soepel. Voor een middenklasse hotel is dit desalniettemin een goede keus.
title: Gemiddeld
